name: Lesser Zombie
description: Chases the character, deal damage on touch.

name: Mutated Zombie
description:
- Chases the character. Tankier but much slower.
- When character is in attack region, charge & attack in circle region.

name: Flaming Skull
description:
- Fire a projectile that deals damage to character on hit.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Mutated Spider
description:
- Spawn in group of 3 - 5. Less HP but faster.
- Chases the character, deal damage on touch.
- When dead, leave a toxic area that deals damage on second.

name: Wild Boar
description:
- Chases the character.
- When character is in attack region, charge & run towards character, deal damage on touch.

name: Speed Hurricane
description:
- Randomly choose a direction and keep moving in that direction.
- Bounce when colliding against the walls. 
- Buff SPD for other enemies within regions. (not stacking but reseting)

name: Jumping Spider
description:
- Chases the character. 
- Each 5 seconds, the spider will jump into the air and drop at player's position after a while.
- It will jump no matter how far the player is.
- There will be indicators to notice the player.

name: Mutated Mole
description:
- Every 3 seconds, Mutated Mole will burrow into the ground. 
- After 2 seconds, it will resurface at a location 4 to 6 meters away from the player and shoot out 8 bullets in 8 equally spaced directions.

name: Bomb Thrower
description:
- Immobile.
- Super high health.
- Shoot a bomb to player's position. The bomb can bounce 2 times. Explode immediately when collided.

name: Novice Necromancer
description:
- Stay at the spawn location.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.
- For seconds, spawn 2 - 3 Novice Summoned.

name: Healing Spider
description:
- For each 5 seconds, approaches the character with random offset. 
- Throw 3 - 5 Bombs around its position.
- The bomb will explode when hitting the ground. Dealing damage to player and heal other enemies within region.

name: Novice Summoned
description:
- Run towards player.
- Explode on death.

name: Nightmare Lesser Zombie
description: Chases the character, deal damage on touch.

name: Nightmare Mutated Zombie
description:
- Chases the character. Tankier but much slower.
- When character is in attack region, charge & attack in circle region.
- When charging, destroy all of the projectiles that enter the region.

name: Nightmare Mutated Spiders
description:
- Spawn in group of 3 - 5. Less HP but faster.
- Chases the character, deal damage on touch.
- When dead, leave a toxic area that deals damage on second.
- The poison is bigger and having slow effect.

name: Nightmare Flaming Skull
description:
- Fire 3 projectiles that deals damage to character on hit.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Nightmare Wild Boar
description:
- Chases the character.
- When character is in attack region, charge & run towards character, deal damage on touch.
- Leaving a fire trail during dashing.
